revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Pikachu Valley |image = [[File:Pikachu Valley.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Pikachu Valley. |tokens = 850,000 |location = North of Route 4 }}
'''Pikachu Valley''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 121 tiles arranged in a 11x11 square, including 11 chest tiles, 41 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 11,952,804 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu ||rowspan=7 colspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Pichu.png|40px]] Pichu |- | [[File:Plusle.png|40px]] Plusle |- | [[File:Minun.png|40px]] Minun |- | [[File:Pachirisu.png|40px]] Pachirisu |- | [[File:Emolga.png|40px]] Emolga |- | [[File:Dedenne.png|40px]] Dedenne |- |}

Base Health |- | [[File:Pikachu (Original cap).png|50px]] Pikachu (Original cap) ||rowspan=6|<center>59,764,020 || rowspan=6 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Pikachu (Hoenn cap).png|50px]] Pikachu (Hoenn cap) |- | [[File:Pikachu (Sinnoh cap).png|50px]] Pikachu (Sinnoh cap) |- | [[File:Pikachu (Unova cap).png|50px]] Pikachu (Unova cap) |- | [[File:Pikachu (Kalos cap).png|50px]] Pikachu (Kalos cap) |- | '''[[File:Pikachu (Alola cap).png|50px]] Pikachu (Alola cap)*''' |- |} '''*Must be Alola champion to unlock'''
